attributes.review: as a very real, not fake trump supporter, this app is fake news. we trump supporters despise fake news. this app makes me sad just looking at it. the orange raisin in a straw colored toupee who is my lord and savior would never put out an app this trashy. take it from a very real trump supporter, take this app off of the app store. always remember all lives matter and date your daughter. 💙🏳️‍🌈✊
attributes.title: it’s gross

attributes.review: I didnt believe all the reviews on here but dude. The first thing it asked me to do was donate to the campaign, it wouldnt even let me go through the app unless I did. Horrible.
